title: karuNai nI puriyAviDil
sahitya:
karuNai nI puriyAviDil gathi enakkAr murugA karaindurugum ennaik-kai koDuttadarittuk-


anupallavi

  aruNagirikku anru aruL seida vElA Arumukha Accival bAlA anbuAan manamirangik-


caraNam    kaNkaNDa daivam enrum kaliyuga varadan enrum kandA unai anbar karudiDal uNmaiyanrO
paNkoNDa shentamizAl pADi unnai paruvum paNiyil tilaikkinra bhaktan en nilai arindu
